channel.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels
channel.description: A Bible Study Of The Miracles Of Jesus In The 4 Gospels.Miracles narrated in 1 gospel only, miracles narrated in 2 gospels, miracles narrated in 3 gospels and a miracle narrated in all 4 gospels. Join Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD as he expounds the Word Of God day by day.
channel.copyright: All audio content Copyrighted Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD. No commercial use by distribution of audio messages/ transcripts of messages allowed without prior written permission from Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD.

image.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels

channel.itunes:author: Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD
channel.itunes:summary: Audio messages by Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD. regarding the miracles of Jesus in the gospels.

item.title: Miracles of Jesus in the Gospels-36
item.description: Jesus heals an epileptic boy
item.itunes:author: Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD
item.itunes:summary: Jesus heals an epileptic boy

item.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels-35
item.description: Jesus walks on water.
item.itunes:author: Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD
item.itunes:summary: Jesus walks on water.

item.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels-34
item.description: Jesus heals a man with a shrivelled hand.
item.itunes:author: Dr. Johnson Cherian MD, PhD
item.itunes:summary: Jesus heals a man with a shrivelled hand.

item.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels-33
item.description: A woman suffering from bleeding for 12 years healed by Jesus.

item.itunes:summary: A woman suffering from bleeding for 12 years healed by Jesus.

item.title: Miracles Of Jesus In The Gospels-32
item.description: Jesus raises Jairus' daughter from the dead.

item.itunes:summary: Jesus raises Jairus' daughter from the dead.
